name: aitomics-ui
description: A local application for managing Aitomics projects with a block-based code editor

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd src/renderer && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run build-preload && npm run start"
scripts.build-preload: tsc src/renderer/src/preload.ts --outDir src/renderer/src --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --skipLibCheck true
